snippet.title: Green Biker Dude - Casual Playthrough (Mega Man X Fan Game)
snippet.description:
This is a casual playthrough of my Mega Man X fan game, Green Biker Dude. Casual meaning I'm not trying for a good score, and I suffer failsome deaths several times. This covers the main "story" mode from start to finish, including the ending.

Quick blurb about the game:
"Now it's your chance to pop that wheelie for everlasting peace! Join the famous Green Biker Dude in his intense pre-X2 training efforts and hone your fighting and racing skills with a Ride Chaser in two different game modes, or compete with a friend locally."

Hope you enjoy! For more information on Green Biker Dude and a download link, visit my site here: http://blyka.legends-station.com/
